name: He-Man: The Most Powerful Game in the Universe
name_original: He-Man: The Most Powerful Game in the Universe
description:
He-Man: The Most Powerful Game in the Universe is an arcade game developed by GlitchSoft. It came out on 25-10-2012. It was published by Chillingo.
You can play He-Man: The Most Powerful Game in the Universe on iOS.
